LanguageData.Manosaba_NarehateCorpse_Label: Corpse of a narehate of a witch
LanguageData.ThingDef_NarehateCorpse_label: Corpse of a narehate of a witch
LanguageData.ThingDef_NarehateCorpse_description: The remains of what was once a human, transformed into a narehate of a witch by the curse of the witch factor. Wait, aren't narehates of witches immortal...?
LanguageData.ThingDef_NarehateCorpse_Note1_text: Through a preliminary investigation, you found obvious anomalies on this corpse of a narehate of a witch. For some reason, her eyes have turned into crystallized inorganic gemstone forms.
LanguageData.ThingDef_NarehateCorpse_Note2_text: You have completely analyzed the secret to killing this narehate of a witch. By using a special potion called Trēdecim, you can nullify the immortality granted by the witch factor and thoroughly kill its carrier.
